defi.title: DeFi Market Intelligence Platform
defi.description: Mempool-level data ingestion, block-level simulation, and atomic bundle execution across chains.

caseStudy.title: Case Study
caseStudy.problem: The rapid growth of DeFi ecosystems has increased market fragmentation, execution latency, and MEV competition across chains. Traders and protocol operators require real-time visibility into mempool activity, accurate block-level simulations, and deterministic execution paths to identify and act on MEV opportunities efficiently.

problemSection.title: Problem
items: High execution risk due to state divergence and latency
Lack of unified visibility across multi-chain mempools
Poor observability into strategy performance and execution health

solutionSection.title: Solution
solutionSection.description: A real-time DeFi market intelligence and execution platform that:
items: Ingests raw mempool data across multiple chains
Constructs and submits atomic bundles via private relays
Provides a unified dashboard for market data, MEV strategies, and execution metrics

items.text: Mempool-level transaction monitoring (pending swaps, liquidations, arbitrage paths)
Atomic bundle construction and submission (Flashbots / private relays)
Low-latency execution pipelines with dynamic gas optimization
Real-time analytics: PnL, latency, success rate, reverted txs
Risk controls: max loss, kill switch, execution guards
